    • Constructor Detail

      • HomeActivity

        public HomeActivity()
        Initializes the instance variables. Initializes the startTime and endTime to the default constructor in the Time class.

      • HomeActivity

        public HomeActivity(java.lang.String title,
                    Time startTime,
                    Time endTime,
                    java.lang.String comment)
        Initializes the title, startTime, endTime and comment variables to the parameters argument passed into the method.
        Parameters:
        title - The variable used to initialize the title variable.
        startTime - The variable used to initialize the startTime variable.
        endTime - The variable used to initialize the endTime variable.
        comment - The variable used to initialize the comment variable.

    • Method Detail

      • equals

        public boolean equals(HomeActivity otherHomeAct)
        Tests for equality of two objects of type HomeActivity. To be equal, the two objects must have the same title, same startTime, same endTime and same comment.
        Parameters:
        otherHomeAct - The home activity being compared to the calling object.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the calling object equals otherHomeAct.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Makes a string containing the title, startTime, endTime and comment variables.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Returns the String containing all the variables in the HomeActivity class.
